attributes.action: Internet, TV And Mobile phone network providers to reduce their fees.
attributes.additional_details:
If many families are forced to stay home with their children, they will not be working and with the 80% salary guarantee, it still doe not cover ALL of the household necessities. 
For the UK population to stay sane, entertained and be given even more financial support, we are asking that all Internet, TV and mobile phone networks to reduce their fees during this time of uncertainty.
attributes.background:
whilst the Coronovirus is impacting not only affecting the UK financially, it is also impacting the UK socially.
If Government could implement a reduced cost of all Internet, TV and mobile network providers, it would got some way to help people in the UK stay connected and offer financial support.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual operators.
